description:
Clean holds are grippy holds. This brush's ample curve ensures you won't grind your knuckles when you're brushing aggressively, and the textured handle prevents the dreaded brush-drop from the top of your route project.

  • Boar's hair bristles are tapered so they're longer at the front
  • Ribbed handle for grip
name: Metolius Razorback Boar's Hair Brush
